numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice an absence of head coaches who are persons of color.
2. It is unsurprising that the number of players who are persons of color is at least double the number of head coaches who are persons of color.
3. I wonder how big the sample size is.
4. I wonder what the numbers are.
5. I wonder what each association plans to do to change this situation.
6. The number of players who are persons of color should correlate with the number of head coaches who are persons of color.
7. This situation may not have a great impact on my immediate community.
9. Some college teams in Iowa are good.
10. This situation mainly affects players of color.
12. Many players of color will not see a head coach who is a person of color during their college athletic career.
13. Many players of color will not see a head coach who is a person of color during their professional athletic career if they choose that path.
14. The headline is: Broken Promises: National Athletics Associations Refuse To Level With Their Commitments to Racial Equity.
